{{Wired embedded system |brand=Gateworks |model=Avila GW2342 |revision=B |manuf_country=USA |is_manuf=Yes |type=single-board computer |pwr_v=6-28 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Intel XScale |cpu1_model=IXP425;FWIXP425BD; |cpu1_cspeed=533 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Intel |fla1_model=TE28F128J3C150 |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4S561632E-TC75 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI, USB 2.0 |expansion_minipci_num=4 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag=yes,, 14-pin header |serial=yes,, console,, DE-9,, (115200 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Intel |eth_chip2_model=LXT973 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=4Kbit CMOS EEPROM with I2C-bus Interface;Philips;PCF8594C-2;;1;,,, Temperature Sensor and Single Channel ADC;Analog Devices;AD7418;;1;,,, 3.3V High-speed Non-inverting Clock Buffer;Pericom;PI49FCT3803;;1;,,, 1.5A Low Dropout Positive Regulator;National Semiconductor;LM1086;;2;,,, +3/5.5V, 250kbps, RS-232 Transmitters/Receivers;Intersil; ICL3232CV;;2;,,, Dual, <!--550kHz,--> 2-Phase Synchronous Regulator;Linear Technology;LTC3728L;;1;,,, Dual 30V N-Channel SyncFET;Fairchild Semiconductor;FDS6982S;;2; |flags=Micro USB, CompactFlash, GPIO, |stock_boot=RedBoot;v1.92;p1; |stock_os=Linux;2.4.24;-uc0; |tp_firmware=DD-WRT, OpenWrt |default_ip=192.168.3.2 |oui_eth=00:02:B3 }}
